Uses of Package
xades4j.production

  • Packages that use xades4j.production 
    Package Description
    xades4j.production
    Support for signature production.
    xades4j.properties
    Types that represent the different XAdES qualifying properties.
    xades4j.providers
    Interfaces for the different components in signature production and verification.
    xades4j.verification
    Support for signature verification.
  • Classes in xades4j.production used by xades4j.production 
    Class and Description
    DataObjectReference
    A reference to a signed data object.
    KeyingDataException
    Base class for exceptions related to tha signing key and certificate chain.
    PropertiesDataGenerationContext
    Context used during the generation of the properties low-level data (property data objects).
    PropertyDataGenerationException
    Thrown when there is an error generating a property data object.
    PropertyDataObjectGenerator
    Interface for generators of property data objects.
    SignedDataObjects
    Represents a set of data objects to be signed.
    SigningCertRequirementException
    Base class for exceptions related to signing certificate requirements.
    XadesFormatExtenderProfile
    A profile for signature format enrichment, after verification.
    XadesSignatureFormatExtender
    Interface for signature enrichment.
    XadesSignatureResult
    The result of signature production.
    XadesSigner
    Interface for a producer of signatures.
    XadesSigner.SignatureAppendingStrategy
    A strategy to append the signature element to a document's DOM tree using a given node as reference.
    XadesSigningProfile
    A profile for signature production.
    XadesTSigningProfile
    A profile for producing XAdES-T signatures.
  • Classes in xades4j.production used by xades4j.properties 
    Class and Description
    SignedDataObjects
    Represents a set of data objects to be signed.
    XadesSigner
    Interface for a producer of signatures.
  • Classes in xades4j.production used by xades4j.providers 
    Class and Description
    KeyingDataException
    Base class for exceptions related to tha signing key and certificate chain.
  • Classes in xades4j.production used by xades4j.verification 
    Class and Description
    XadesSignatureFormatExtender
    Interface for signature enrichment.
